languages.text: Ульфар покинул корабль Вольного Торговца и направился на планету, где, предположительно, могут отыскаться следы его стаи, в одиночку. Если Лорд-капитан желает оказать соратнику помощь в экспедиции, {mf|ему|ей} предстоит также высадиться на промерзшую планету.

Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.
languages.original_text: Ульфар покинул корабль Вольного Торговца и направился на планету, где, предположительно, могут отыскаться следы его стаи, в одиночку. Если Лорд-капитан желает оказать соратнику помощь в экспедиции, {mf|ему|ей} предстоит также высадиться на промерзшую планету.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

languages.text: Ulfar s'est rendu seul sur la planète où il pense pouvoir retrouver la trace de sa meute. Si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} souhaite aider son allié dans cette expédition, {mf|il|elle} devra {mf|lui|elle} aussi débarquer sur ce monde gelé.
languages.original_text: Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar s'est rendu seul sur la planète où il pense pouvoir retrouver la trace de sa meute. Si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} souhaite aider son allié dans cette expédition, {mf|il|elle} devra {mf|lui|elle} aussi débarquer sur ce monde gelé.

languages.text: 乌尔法离开了行商浪人的舰队，前往某颗遥远的行星，他的狼群似乎去了那个地方。如果行商浪人打算协助{mf|他|她}的盟友完成这场远征，那{mf|他|她}必须亲自前往那颗冰封的行星表面。
languages.original_text: Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法离开了行商浪人的舰队，前往某颗遥远的行星，他的狼群似乎去了那个地方。如果行商浪人打算协助{mf|他|她}的盟友完成这场远征，那{mf|他|她}必须亲自前往那颗冰封的行星表面。

languages.text: ウルファーはローグトレーダーの船から降り、自身の群れの存在を示す証拠があると思われる惑星に単身で向かった。ロード・キャプテンがこの遠征で仲間を助けるつもりなら、自らもこの凍てつく惑星に降下しなければならない。
languages.original_text: Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

traits.locale_text: ウルファーはローグトレーダーの船から降り、自身の群れの存在を示す証拠があると思われる惑星に単身で向かった。ロード・キャプテンがこの遠征で仲間を助けるつもりなら、自らもこの凍てつく惑星に降下しなければならない。

languages.text: Ulfar hat das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verlassen und ist auf den Planet gegangen, auf dem Hinweise auf die Anwesenheit seines Rudels vermutet werden. Und er hat das allein getan. Wenn der Lord Captain seinem Verbündeten bei dieser Expedition zur Seite stehen will, muss er ebenfalls auf diesem gefrorenen Planeten landen.
languages.original_text: Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar hat das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verlassen und ist auf den Planet gegangen, auf dem Hinweise auf die Anwesenheit seines Rudels vermutet werden. Und er hat das allein getan. Wenn der Lord Captain seinem Verbündeten bei dieser Expedition zur Seite stehen will, muss er ebenfalls auf diesem gefrorenen Planeten landen.

languages.text: Ulfar ha desembarcado de la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y descendido al planeta que presuntamente alberga pruebas de la presencia de su jauría en solitario. Si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene intención de ayudar a su aliado, tendrá que aterrizar en este planeta helado.
languages.original_text: Ulfar disembarked from the Rogue Trader's ship and headed to the planet that is presumed to hold evidence of his pack's presence, and he did so alone. If the Lord Captain intends to aid {mf|his|her} ally in this expedition, {mf|he|she} too will have to make planetfall on this frozen planet.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar ha desembarcado de la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y descendido al planeta que presuntamente alberga pruebas de la presencia de su jauría en solitario. Si {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene intención de ayudar a su aliado, tendrá que aterrizar en este planeta helado.
